mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inventory_items ( item_id, product_id, batch_number, serial_number, quantity, unit_of_measure, warehouse_id, expiry_date, entry_date, status, cost_price, is_traceable ) VALUES ( #{itemId}, #{productId}, #{batchNumber}, #{serialNumber}, #{quantity}, #{unitOfMeasure}, #{warehouseId}, #{expiryDate}, #{entryDate}, #{status}, #{costPrice}, #{isTraceable} )
mapper.select: SELECT item_id AS itemId, product_id AS productId, batch_number AS batchNumber, serial_number AS serialNumber, quantity, unit_of_measure AS unitOfMeasure, warehouse_id AS warehouseId, expiry_date AS expiryDate, entry_date AS entryDate, status, cost_price AS costPrice, is_traceable AS isTraceable FROM inventory_items WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
